name: Shadeform
headline: The GPU Cloud Marketplace
description: Teams struggling with GPU availability use our platform to unlock capacity immediately for their growing AI workloads. Shadeform has a unified, easy-to-use API and platform to access and provision GPUs and deploy models for inference to any provider. With our aggregated availability and pricing data, we can help ensure your on-demand inference and training jobs will run on time at optimal cost.

founders.name: Ed Goode, Founder
founders.description: CEO @ Shadeform. SWE with experience building distributed systems, compute orchestrators, and NLU & NLP services. Building a single control plane for the GPU market.

founders.name: Ronald Ding, Founder
founders.description: CTO @ Shadeform. Former engineer and TL at Robinhood, AWS, and Microsoft working on large scale, distributed infrastructure.

A single, simple API.See prices and availability for every cloud and launch and manage your cross-cloud fleet, all in one place.
curlpythonTerraform![Dots](https://www.shadeform.ai/_next/image?url=%2Fimg%2Ffx%2Fdot-grid-sm.png&w=64&q=75)
01.Compare cloud's price and availability
Single pane of glass into the GPU market with live availability and pricing for all cloud providers.
02.Launch in your cloud or ours
03.Manage all instances on a single platform
bash
200
```
curl --request GET \--url https://api.shadeform.ai/v1/instances/types \--header 'X-API-KEY: <x-api-key>'
```

```
{"instance_types":[{"cloud":"nebius","shade_instance_type":"H100_sxm5","cloud_instance_type":"gpu-h100-sxm|1gpu-16vcpu-200gb","configuration":{"memory_in_gb":200,"storage_in_gb":465,"vcpus":16,"num_gpus":1,"gpu_type":"H100","interconnect":"sxm5","nvlink":false,"os_options":["ubuntu22.04_cuda12.4_shade_os","ubuntu22.04"],"vram_per_gpu_in_gb":80},"memory_in_gb":200,"storage_in_gb":465,"vcpus":16,"num_gpus":1,"gpu_type":"H100","interconnect":"sxm5","nvlink":false,"hourly_price":306,"availability":[{"region":"helsinki-finland-3","available":true,"display_name":"EU, Helsinki"}],"boot_time":{"min_boot_in_sec":300,"max_boot_in_sec":600},"deployment_type":"vm"}]}
```

curlpythonTerraform
```

```

02.Launch in your cloud or ours
Manage your own cloud provider account with Shadeform or launch GPUs without account setup in Shade Cloud.
curlpythonTerraform
```
curl --request POST \--url https://api.shadeform.ai/v1/instances/create \--header 'Content-Type: application/json'\--header 'X-API-KEY: <x-api-key>'\--data '{
  "cloud": "lambdalabs",
  "name": "cool-gpu-server",
  "region": "na-us-bos-1",
  "shade_cloud": true,
  "shade_instance_type": "A100"
}'
```

bash
```
{"cloud_assigned_id":"13b057d7-e266-4869-985f-760fe75a78b3","id":"d290f1ee-6c54-4b01-90e6-d701748f0851"}
```

curlpythonTerraform


generated_description:
**Shadeform: Revolutionizing GPU Accessibility** 

Founded in 2023 and a proud member of Y Combinator‚Äôs S23 batch, Shadeform aims to be your go-to solution for GPU resources through its unique **GPU Cloud Marketplace**. 

Imagine a world where teams are wrestling with GPU availability, especially while managing escalating AI workloads. That's where Shadeform steps in‚Äîoffering a unified, user-friendly API that enables users to access and provision GPU resources from multiple providers seamlessly. This platform ensures that your on-demand inference and training tasks run on time and at the best possible cost.
